column4: Hey, i'm trying to install mysql on apache...i uncommented "extension=mysql.so" from php.ini...restarted apache...nothing
sudo aptitude install mysql && sudo /etc/init.d/mysql start
i did that and it did some stuff...then the last line was : sudo: /etc/init.d/mysql: command not found
what do i do in postfix?
If you don't know what postfix is for then remove it.
ps aux|grep mysql to find out
try to stop apache with /etc/init.d/apache2 stop
